name: Odd-Eyes Crescent Pendulum Dragon
text: Created from fragments of the Moon itself, this stunning dragon materialises itself rarely. Those lucky enough to meet it, have said it takes the form of a crescent moon. It's cry is said to sound like the moon.
pendulum_text: All Pendulum monsters you control are treated as "Odd-Eyes" monsters. If an Odd-Eyes monster(s) is Pendulum Summoned: Inflict 500 damage to your opponent for each of those monsters. You can only use this effect of "Odd-Eyes Crescent Pendulum Dragon" once per turn.
